Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Morning!  how many characters can go in the Title and Description boxes so they are all visible in all the formats? Think some formats are cutting off the message. Thank you

Good morning! The character limits for titles and descriptions can vary depending on the ad format. To ensure your message is fully visible across all formats, it's best to keep your title under 30 characters and your description under 90 characters. For more detailed information on ad formats and placements, you can check out this article: [Types of NewsBreak Ad Formats and Placements](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/20229876903053-Types-of-NewsBreak-Ad-Formats-and-Placements). Let me know if you have any other questions!
MorningCould you tell me which 'industry' to choose for an ad account when we're advertising BizOpps and work-from-home offers? I understand its quite important for the algorithm?Thank you

Good morning! For BizOpps and work-from-home offers, you should choose the 'Online services and utilities' industry for your ad account. This helps optimize your ads, especially during the cold start phase when there are no learnings on the ad. You can find more details in our FAQ article here: [NewsBreak FAQ](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17959734533005-NewsBreak-Advertising-Cost). Let me know if you have any other questions!
The 'Online services and utilities' industry falls under the 'Ecomm' category. This is the best fit for BizOpps and work-from-home offers. If you need more information, feel free to ask!
whats the top category so i can drill down - ecomm does not exist

I apologize for the confusion. The top category you should select is 'Business and Finance.' From there, you can drill down to find 'Online services and utilities' or similar subcategories that best fit BizOpps and work-from-home offers. If you need further assistance, let me know!

It seems like you're asking about lookalike audiences. Lookalike audiences are a type of audience targeting that allows advertisers to reach new people who are likely to be interested in their business because they share similar characteristics with their existing customers. This feature is often used for expanding reach and finding potential new customers. If you have more specific questions or need guidance on creating lookalike audiences, feel free to ask!

Currently, NewsBreak does not support lookalike audiences directly. However, you can create custom audiences by uploading a CSV file with user identifiers like email addresses or device IDs. This allows you to target users who have already engaged with your business. For more details on creating custom audiences, you can check out our guide here: [Introduction to Audience Management](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/26679465558669-Introduction-to-Audience-Management).
